alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A very strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dickinson County through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a very strong thunderstorm near Felch, or 9 miles northeast of Iron Mountain, moving east at 25 mph. This was previously a severe thunderstorm and has a history of large hail, but is slowly weakening as it crosses south-central Upper Michigan this evening. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Felch around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Foster City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
